---

 Positive integer multiplication in terms of ordinal multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-1995.)
statement: mulpiord $p |- ( ( A e. N. /\ B e. N. ) -> ( A .N B ) = ( A .o B ) ) $.
